titles.title: Pension Portability Improvement Act of 1993

To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 in order to increase the adequacy and efficiency of the private pension system (consisting of employer and individual retirement plans) by reducing pension vesting requirements, improving the portability of earned pension benefits, and encouraging the preservation of pension asset accumulations for use in retirement, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 4/28/1993--Introduced. Pension Portability Improvement Act of 1993 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) and the Internal Revenue Code to revise minimum vesting standards for certain pension plans. Establishes portability requirements for certain qualified pension plans. Sets forth prototype portable pension accounts. Provides exemptions for certain collectively bargained plans.
